Package Controller

Class ControllerSimulationPriceMenu

java.lang.Object
Controller.Controller
Controller.ControllerSimulation
Controller.ControllerSimulationPriceMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceController
public class ControllerSimulationPriceMenu extends ControllerSimulation
The ControllerSimulationPriceMenu class manages the interactions between the view and the simulation model for the price menu in the kiosk simulation.
